column5: The house is 3 easy walking blocks to the AT&T Cowboys Stadium, and a short walk to the Texas Rangers Globe Life Park, less than a mile drive to Six Flags and Hurricane Harbor! There are shopping malls, strip & outlet malls, & any type of restaurant & bar you could want within 15 mins. There is a short walk to Walmart, Walgreens, and Lincoln Square shopping & dining center. You are 20 min. from downtown Dallas to the east, and 20 min. from downtown Ft.Worth.
